title: 引っ越しの 準備
text: 来月アパートを引っ越します。今から段ボール箱を集めています。たくさん荷物があるので、大変です。特に本が重くて困ります。友達に手伝ってもらう約束をしました。引っ越したら、近くのカフェでお礼にご飯を食べに行きます。新しい家が楽しみです。
text_romaji: Raigetsu apāto o hikkoshimasu. Ima kara danbōru hako o atsumete imasu. Takusan nimotsu ga aru node, taihen desu. Tokuni hon ga omokute komarimasu. Tomodachi ni tetsudatte morau yakusoku o shimashita. Hikkoshitara, chikaku no kafe de orei ni gohan o tabe ni ikimasu. Atarashii ie ga tanoshimi desu.
english: I'm moving apartments next month. I'm collecting cardboard boxes from now. Since there are many things, it's tough. Especially the books are heavy and troublesome. I promised to have a friend help me. After moving, I'll go to eat at a nearby cafe as a thank you. I'm looking forward to the new house.

vocab.meaning: to be troubled, to have difficulty
